name: predso
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wor(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wcel(c3, cpred(c0, c1, c2)), wss(cpred(c0, c1, c3), cpred(c0, c1, c2))))
